name: CryptoRavine
description:
CryptoRavine is a puzzle platfromer where you play as two robots


I recommend downloading and running the game properly instead of a html

There are two endings in game (bad and a good one)

the voiceover for the ending was done by Let's Talk Game Design

Also check out logana(nesmaker) ,he made some of the music for me
but i forgot to add it :( ,but you can check him out anyway
he is a very cool guy
